alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 06 at 2:03AM MDT until October 06 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...Northern Oglala Lakota County, Bennett County, Southern Oglala Lakota County and Southern Jackson County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM MDT early this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 8 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota
